title: Twister

sections.heading: HOW TO PLAY
sections.body:
• Connect the switch to the all-turn-it spinner
• Stick images of body parts around the outside of the All-Turn-It spinner and prompt the switch user to hit the switch to make a random selection of which body part the player needs to use e.g right hand
• Next stick colours around the outside of the All-Turn-It spinner for the switch user to make another random selection of which colour spot the player must find for their body part e.g right hand on green

tooltipText: Use an All-Turn-It spinner (or similar) to join in a game of Twister
